ModMetaData.name: Sarcophagus Patch
ModMetaData.author: thakyZ
ModMetaData.description: Fixes a bug with vanilla Sarcophagus (This is the dev version of Sarcophagus Patch. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
